name: Might of the Master
entries: At 14th level, your minion's power is permanently linked with yours. When you are affected by a spell you can choose to share the effect with your minion as long as it is within 30 feet of you. Also when you fail a saving throw against a negative effect from a spell, such as hold person, and your minion is within 30 feet both you and your minion can use your reactions to have the spell take effect on your minion instead.
Your minion can become large and any future minions can be large as well.
